message: speakers and presentations are our core focus - supporting gigs and film previews would have a bit off topic for us
So you can click on someone in the Twitter web interface and see what sessions they are planning to attend - great for if you're trying to meet up with someone
not to mention that just handling the sessions for interactive is a full-time job for both of us!
We've just released a Chrome/Firefox browser extension that adds people's Lanyrd SXSW session plans directly in to the Twitter.com interface
Also, if you haven't played with http://sxsw.lanyrd.com/ you really should - it's a great way of exploring the schedule
sad that the film schedule is empty :(
yeah, we decided not to handle film and music this year :/
I'm just lamenting as I'd love to use lanyrd for both
